price: 22. Waxaanu sahalnay Qur’aanka si loo xusuusto, mase jiraa mid ku waantoobi?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
